messages.message: cool, just one quick ques. Did you run some tests on this branch to make sure there aren’t differences between the branches?
@Heymian you mean test it locally? let me get to it now

yeah, because the code on the branches is different, and uat is over. No one else is going to be able to sanity check things before it lands directly in customer’s hands. So need to rely on you to uat it :slightly_smiling_face:
@Heymian I finished up my UAT for this bugfix!
i actually just realized/remembered the merge restrictions on the release branches aren’t actually there, so technically anyone can merge.
haha but i guess good to get a second set of eyes on it/we might put the restrction back in to protect it. :stuck_out_tongue:
@Heymian hmm at least the release owner should be aware of it right? maybe that restriction should be put back in place for things that are already in production. I dont know :stuck_out_tongue: .
yeah, completely agree that we should have some restrictions on this branch. appreciate your care/thought about the process!
but also if I were to just merge stuff, the release owner should know about so they can deploy and push to customers? or do things get deployed automatically for prod?
is it important enough that we need to redeploy to any customers who have taken the branch already?
but yeah, nothing gets auto deployed to prod so you would need someone to push it. We’re about to push the May one onto it, so I’m not too worried there.
I’d say so but I’ll let @Kerry / @lydia chime in/confirm. I haven’t heard about any bugs or issues that came up but you can’t compile a binary if your refiner program is in a bad folder.

that’s probably not critical enough that we would force a rebuild/ship of the service. I think only Goldman picked up the April release so far, so we can probably rebuild only if they run into the problem.
oh alright, so only goldman is on that release and could hit that issue? the other customers will get the patched april release when the time comes?
if only GS is on the April release and no one else is getting it, let’s just patch it for the May release for now. thanks @Felicia and @Heymian
